title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 328.4 - Date of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 328.4 - Date of hearing

State Regulations

The chairman shall, from time to time, prepare a calendar
of cases for arbitration and with the medical society and the rating board
shall arrange for the time and place of hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
328.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
